name: The Land of Eyas
description: Lost with no memory of where he is or how he got there, lead Eyas – a boy in a cat suit – on a quest to get home. But how do you know which way to go when you can’t tell which is up and which is down?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) or newer Processor: Intel Dual Core 2 Ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA/AMD/Intel HD with OpenGL 2 support Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard

reviews.review_text: The Land of Eyas is a really polished, gravity based 2D puzzle - platformer.  The lore is hidden between the levels and you need to explore the land to understand the story, which is the best way of telling the story to the player.  The art style is great with a really well made soundtrack.   Game is based on 'choose your own level to contiune' and has an ability which most of the 2D platformers lacking, climbing!   It also has 'timer' feature and all levels has a 'time goal' to beat. I might try to speedrun this game at some point.  If you are fan of the platformer genre, you will definetly like this game. I fully recommend it.
The Land of Eyas is very sweet and beautiful game, but very challenging puzzle platformer. Worth every cent! Recommendation!
